mapper.select: select * from sys_menu m where m.menu_id = #{menuId};
select * from sys_menu m where m.menu_name = #{menuName};

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.`query`, m.visible, m.status, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.is_frame, m.is_cache, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.role_id left join user u on ur.user_id = u.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = 0 AND ro.status = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
